casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee v. Ever David GRANADOS, Defendant-Appellant. No. 12-50647

Conference Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 20, 2013. Joseph H. Gay, Jr., Assistant U.S. Attorney, U.S. Attorney’s Office, San Antonio, TX, for Plaintiff-Appellee. Ruben P. Morales, El Paso, TX, for Defendant-Appellant. Before HIGGINBOTHAM, SMITH, and GRAVES, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM: *

The attorney appointed to represent Ever David Granados has moved for leave to withdraw and has filed a brief in accor-

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be *376published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
